content.text:
# List of Turkic Speaking States summits

}}
The following lists the Turkic Speaking States Heads of States Summits organized between 1992 and 2010. These summits were followed by the Turkic Council summits between 2011 and 2021 and as Organization of Turkic States summits since 2022.
1st summit
The first Turkic Speaking States summit was held in Ankara, Turkey, on October 30, 1992.
File:Emblem of Azerbaijan.svg|Abulfaz Elchibey, President of Azerbaijan
File:Назарбаев ЕАЭС (cropped).jpg|Nursultan Nazarbayev, President of Kazakhstan
File:Askar Akayev - May 1994.jpg|Askar Akayev, President of Kyrgyzstan
File:Turgut Özal as Turkish Prime Minister.jpg|Turgut Özal, President of Turkey (host)
File:Saparmurat Niyazov (2).jpg|Saparmurat Niyazov, President of Turkmenistan
File:Valdis Dombrovskis tiekas ar Uzbekistānas prezidentu (cropped).jpg|Islam Karimov, President of Uzbekistan
2nd summit
The second Turkic Speaking States summit was held in Istanbul, Turkey, on October 18, 1994.
File:Heydar Aliyev (crop).jpg|Heydar Aliyev, President of Azerbaijan
File:Назарбаев ЕАЭС (cropped).jpg|Nursultan Nazarbayev, President of Kazakhstan
File:Askar Akayev - May 1994.jpg|Askar Akayev, President of Kyrgyzstan
File:Suleyman Demirel 1998.jpg|Süleyman Demirel, President of Turkey (host)
File:Saparmurat Niyazov (2).jpg|Saparmurat Niyazov, President of Turkmenistan
File:Valdis Dombrovskis tiekas ar Uzbekistānas prezidentu (cropped).jpg|Islam Karimov, President of Uzbekistan
3rd summit
The third Turkic Speaking States summit was held in Bishkek, Kyrgyzstan, on August 28, 1995.
File:Heydar Aliyev (crop).jpg|Heydar Aliyev, President of Azerbaijan
File:Назарбаев ЕАЭС (cropped).jpg|Nursultan Nazarbayev, President of Kazakhstan
File:Askar Akayev - May 1994.jpg|Askar Akayev, President of Kyrgyzstan (host)
File:Suleyman Demirel 1998.jpg|Süleyman Demirel, President of Turkey
File:Saparmurat Niyazov (2).jpg|Saparmurat Niyazov, President of Turkmenistan
File:Valdis Dombrovskis tiekas ar Uzbekistānas prezidentu (cropped).jpg|Islam Karimov, President of Uzbekistan
4th summit
The fourth Turkic Speaking States summit was held in Tashkent, Uzbekistan, on October 21, 1996.
File:Heydar Aliyev (crop).jpg|Heydar Aliyev, President of Azerbaijan
File:Назарбаев ЕАЭС (cropped).jpg|Nursultan Nazarbayev, President of Kazakhstan
File:Askar Akayev - May 1994.jpg|Askar Akayev, President of Kyrgyzstan
File:Suleyman Demirel 1998.jpg|Süleyman Demirel, President of Turkey
File:Saparmurat Niyazov (2).jpg|Saparmurat Niyazov, President of Turkmenistan
File:Valdis Dombrovskis tiekas ar Uzbekistānas prezidentu (cropped).jpg|Islam Karimov, President of Uzbekistan (host)
5th summit
The fifth Turkic Speaking States summit was held in Astana, Kazakhstan, on June 9, 1998.
File:Heydar Aliyev (crop).jpg|Heydar Aliyev, President of Azerbaijan
File:Назарбаев ЕАЭС (cropped).jpg|Nursultan Nazarbayev, President of Kazakhstan (host)
File:Askar Akayev - May 1994.jpg|Askar Akayev, President of Kyrgyzstan
File:Suleyman Demirel 1998.jpg|Süleyman Demirel, President of Turkey
File:Saparmurat Niyazov (2).jpg|Saparmurat Niyazov, President of Turkmenistan
File:Valdis Dombrovskis tiekas ar Uzbekistānas prezidentu (cropped).jpg|Islam Karimov, President of Uzbekistan
6th summit
The sixth Turkic Speaking States summit was held in Baku, Azerbaijan, on April 8, 2000.
File:Heydar Aliyev (crop).jpg|Heydar Aliyev, President of Azerbaijan (host)
File:Назарбаев ЕАЭС (cropped).jpg|Nursultan Nazarbayev, President of Kazakhstan
File:Askar Akayev - May 1994.jpg|Askar Akayev, President of Kyrgyzstan
File:Suleyman Demirel 1998.jpg|Süleyman Demirel, President of Turkey
File:Saparmurat Niyazov (2).jpg|Saparmurat Niyazov, President of Turkmenistan
File:Valdis Dombrovskis tiekas ar Uzbekistānas prezidentu (cropped).jpg|Islam Karimov, President of Uzbekistan
7th summit
The seventh Turkic Speaking States summit was held in Istanbul, Turkey, on April 26, 2001.
File:Heydar Aliyev (crop).jpg|Heydar Aliyev, President of Azerbaijan
File:Назарбаев ЕАЭС (cropped).jpg|Nursultan Nazarbayev, President of Kazakhstan
File:Askar Akayev - May 1994.jpg|Askar Akayev, President of Kyrgyzstan
File:Ahmet Necdet Sezer.jpg|Ahmet Necdet Sezer, President of Turkey (host)
File:Saparmurat Niyazov (2).jpg|Saparmurat Niyazov, President of Turkmenistan
File:Emblem of Uzbekistan.svg|Erkin Halilov, Speaker of the Legislative Chamber of Uzbekistan
8th summit
The eighth Turkic Speaking States summit was held in Antalya, Turkey, on November 17, 2006.
File:Ilham Aliyev Bogdan Borusewicz Senate of Poland (cropped).JPG|Ilham Aliyev, President of Azerbaijan
File:Назарбаев ЕАЭС (cropped).jpg|Nursultan Nazarbayev, President of Kazakhstan
File:Kurmanbek Bakiyev 2006.jpg|Kurmanbek Bakiyev, President of Kyrgyzstan
File:Ahmet Necdet Sezer.jpg|Ahmet Necdet Sezer, President of Turkey (host)
File:Emblem of Turkmenistan.svg|(Ambassador of Turkmenistan)
9th summit
The ninth Turkic Speaking States summit was held in Nakhchivan, Azerbaijan, on October 3, 2009. The Nakhchivan Agreement signed for founding the Turkic Council.
File:Ilham Aliyev Bogdan Borusewicz Senate of Poland (cropped).JPG|Ilham Aliyev, President of Azerbaijan (host)
File:Назарбаев ЕАЭС (cropped).jpg|Nursultan Nazarbayev, President of Kazakhstan
File:Kurmanbek Bakiyev 2006.jpg|Kurmanbek Bakiyev, President of Kyrgyzstan
File:Abdullah Gül Senate of Poland (cropped).JPG|Abdullah Gül, President of Turkey
File:AM Turkmenistan (12840371845, cropped).jpg|Raşit Meredow, Vice President of Turkmenistan
10th summit
The tenth and last Turkic Speaking States summit was held in Istanbul, Turkey, on September 15, 2010. A consultative board of elders has been established.
File:Ilham Aliyev Bogdan Borusewicz Senate of Poland (cropped).JPG|Ilham Aliyev, President of Azerbaijan
File:Назарбаев ЕАЭС (cropped).jpg|Nursultan Nazarbayev, President of Kazakhstan
File:Roza Otunbayeva - Kyrgyzstan - 2011 International Women of Courage awards.jpg|Roza Otunbayeva, President of Kyrgyzstan
File:Abdullah Gül Senate of Poland (cropped).JPG|Abdullah Gül, President of Turkey (host)
File:Gurbanguly Berdimuhamedow at the Enthronement of Naruhito (1).jpg|Gurbanguly Berdimuhamedow, Former President of Turkmenistan
